org.antfarmer.ejce

Interface ValueEncryptorInterface<T extends ValueEncryptorInterface<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the concrete type of this Encryptor object.
    All Superinterfaces:
    EncryptorInterface<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractValueEncryptor, Encryptor

    public interface ValueEncryptorInterface<T extends ValueEncryptorInterface<T>>
extends EncryptorInterface<T>
    Interface for encrypting/decrypting text and other values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • encrypt

        String encrypt(String text)
        throws GeneralSecurityException
        Returns an encrypted and encoded text representation of the given text.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be encrypted
        Returns:
        an encrypted and encoded version of the text
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - GeneralSecurityException

      • decrypt

        String decrypt(String text)
        throws GeneralSecurityException
        Returns the decoded and decrypted text for the given text representation. This method will only work with data encrypted using the encrypt method.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be decrypted
        Returns:
        a decrypted and decoded version of the text
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - GeneralSecurityException

      • encryptBoolean

        String encryptBoolean(Boolean value)
               throws GeneralSecurityException
        Returns an encrypted and encoded text representation of the given boolean. This is generally the most efficient means of encrypting a boolean, as the bit representation is used for encryption rather than the string representation.
        Parameters:
        value - the short to be encrypted
        Returns:
        an encrypted and encoded version of the boolean
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - GeneralSecurityException
